ygData.subject: SV: [EverQuest] Something nice for a friend
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the nicest things is the shit you get to hear after you lead a successful multi group event. Either that or when I logged on to find out the guild had a
ygData.messageBody:
Well, the nicest things is the shit you get to hear after you lead a successful multi group event. Either that or when I logged on to find out the guild had a lozidal shield for me. Now that may not be much for blue servers, but on tallon lod shields are still pretty nice for a shaman =P
 
-domi
-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Från: Warden, Kenneth [mailto:kwarden@...]
Skickat: den 6 september 2001 22:09
Till: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Ämne: RE: [EverQuest] Something nice for a friend

The nicest thing anyone has done is shown me friendship.  I do two things one is to help their alts that may be lower than me and two help someone else who is new. Thank you Fiergus for your help and friendship.
 
Keldren
Druzzil Ro
-----Original Message-----
From: Thomas H. Comegys [mailto:comegys@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 06, 2001 3:52 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Something nice for a friend


----- Original Message -----
From: <an_inspiration@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 06, 2001 10:40 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Something nice for a friend


> What is the nicest thing someone has done for you in game?
>
> A friend of mine has been showing me the ropes of EQ and, when I get
> high enough, I want to repay him for his kindness.  Looking for ideas.
>
> Thanks all.
>
> Lizz ~

I was playing my (at the time) level 3 DE necro, killing vermin near the
newbie log in Nektulos, when a level 54 necro passing by asked if I had a
fire beetle eye to sell him. I gave it to him, and he gave me 200 platinum
for it. Speechless, to say the least.

Must be nice to have so much plat you can do those kinds of things.
